name: The Labyrinth (itch) (ralh)
description:
As the ancient Greek hero Theseus you must escape the labyrinth! To do that you'll have to get some help from the minotaur, whether he's willing or not...

Originally made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 48: Teamwork.

Theme: Teamwork

Limitation: The player can not attack

Controls:

  • WSAD to move
  • Space to dodge

Tools used:

  • Godot 3.2
  • Aseprite
  • Bfxr

Credits:

  • Prelude and Action by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4236-prelude-and-action License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Windswept by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4629-windswept License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Visitor font by Brian Kent https://www.dafont.com/visitor.font
